title: Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo
description: When customers from the repo are selected, most menu actions should be disabled. However, there is currently some irrelevant content displayed that should be removed.
OB: When customers from the repo are selected, some menu actions are not being disabled as expected, and there is irrelevant content displayed that should be removed.
EB: When customers from the repo are selected, all menu actions except for 'convert line delimiters' should be disabled. Additionally, the irrelevant content should be removed.
SR: Ensure that when customers from the repo are selected, all menu actions except for 'convert line delimiters' are disabled. Remove any irrelevant content that is displayed.
